status.description:
Validation Status:
- `valid`: The SCO is valid.
- `invalid`: The SCO is invalid.
- `error`: There was an error.

items.description:
Invalid reason codes:
- `101`: SCO declared incomplete
- `102`: SCO deserialization failed   
- `201`: Sellers.json not resolved
- `202`: Ads.txt not resolved
- `203`: App-ads.txt not resolved
- `204`: Unable to resolve seller domain
- `205`: Publisher missing in SCO
- `206`: Direct seller not authorized
- `207`: Reseller not authorized
- `208`: Reseller listed as direct seller
- `209`: Link in SCO missing in sellers.json
